EmailTemplate.name: Tennessee invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Forget to Register: vAuto Provisioning Workshop - Franklin, TN - April 14
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
vAuto Provisioning Workshop Franklin, TN Tuesday, April 14, 2015
Please join us on Tuesday, April 14 in Franklin, TN when Darrel Ferguson, Senior Performance Manager at vAuto, will conduct a Provisioning Workshop.
This workshop is complimentary to all vAuto customers and is recommended for General Managers, Sales Managers, and Buyers.
Workshop Overview: A “hands on” introduction to Provision’s stocking tool, which can help solve dealers’ biggest challenge: sourcing inventory.
Using your own device (laptop/tablet), Darrel will lead you through the Provision stocking tool in its entirety: from set-up to vehicle acquisition. You will be given opportunities throughout the session to apply what you’ve learned in your own dealership’s Provision application. In this session, Darrel will also include best practice sourcing techniques, Advanced Workbench, and AuctionGenius.
Workshop Objectives: - Define your dealership stocking strategy & objectives - Ensure the settings for the Provision stocking tool are set up optimally for your dealership - Learn to use vAuto’s unique grading system to identify vehicles that fit your dealership's stocking objectives - Create a list of vehicles for purchase
What to Bring: - Your laptop or other device that you use to access vAuto’s Provision tool (not required, but highly recommended. WiFi will be provided) - Your questions / comments / challenges / enthusiasm
Location: Franklin Marriott Cool Springs 700 Cool Springs Boulevard Franklin, TN 37067 615-261-6100
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Registration: Please use this link to register <http://go.vauto.com/Tennessee-Workshop-April-14.html> your attendees by April 7th. You will have to fill out the form for each person you would like to register. Once you submit the form, you will receive a confirmation email.
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Franklin Marriott Cool Springs, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/bnacs-franklin-marriott-cool-springs/> or call the hotel directly at 410-859-8300.
We hope to see you there! -vAuto Marketing
Location: Franklin Marriott Cool Springs 700 Cool Springs Boulevard Franklin, TN 37067 615-261-6100
